ResearchProjectDef.label: anatomy and physiology
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study of anatomy and biomechanics that allows you to craft simple prosthetic parts and artificial bones at a machining table.

ResearchProjectDef.label: regenerative medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced research into tissue regeneration. Allows scars and old wounds to be cured with glitterworld medicine.

ResearchProjectDef.label: organ transplantation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study of transplantation medicine and organ rejection management. Allows donor organs to be transplanted into patients.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Study of biomimetics and engineering. Unlocks the Bionic workbench, along with high-tech bionic parts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced bionics
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further study of bionics. Unlocks the Advanced medical station, along with powerful bionic upgrades. Also allows for the removal of Death acidifiers.

ResearchProjectDef.label: synthetic organs
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced research into nano-technology and tissue engineering. Unlocks highly efficient synthetic organs with no transplant rejection symptoms.

ResearchProjectDef.label: neuroscience
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to perform advanced surgery on the brain. Unlocks powerful brain implants that enhance abilities and cure brain diseases. Relies on very rare AI technology from Glitterworlds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: nanomedicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Advanced research into molecular nano-technology and cellular manipulation. Allows for the elimination of specific whole body ailments and diseases such as Frailty, Sleeping sickness, Muscle parasites, Mechanites, Gut worms and other infections.
